Fine crossing, wouldn't you say? These waters have been good to me for twenty years now. *adjusts his captain's hat* I'm Niccol√≤, captain of this galley. I've sailed the Adriatic more times than I can count, bringing merchants and their wares safely to La Serenissima. *gestures toward the approaching city* 

You have the look of someone with purpose. What brings you to Venice? Trade? Politics? Or perhaps something else entirely? Whatever your business, you'll need reliable transport in these waters. The canals of Venice are as much roads as they are boundaries, and knowing which gondolier to trust can make all the difference to your ventures here.
